lifestreet.title: Lifestreet Adapter Params
lifestreet.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Lifestreet adapter

slot_tag.description: A tag which identifies the ad slot

audienceNetwork.title: Facebook Audience Network Adapter Params
audienceNetwork.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Facebook Audience Network adapter

placementId.description: An ID which identifies the placement selling the impression

appnexus.title: Appnexus Adapter Params
appnexus.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the AppNexus adapter

placementId.description: An ID which identifies this placement of the impression

invCode.description: A code identifying the inventory of this placement.

member.description: An ID which identifies the member selling the impression.

items.description: A key with one or more values associated with it. These are used in buy-side segment targeting.

trafficSourceCode.description: Specifies the third-party source of this impression.

reserve.description: The minimium acceptable bid, in CPM, using US Dollars

position.description: Specifies the ad unit as above or below the fold

pubmatic.title: Pubmatic Adapter Params
pubmatic.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Pubmatic adapter

publisherId.description: An ID which identifies the publisher

adSlot.description: An ID which identifies the ad slot

rubicon.title: Rubicon Adapter Params
rubicon.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Rubicon adapter

accountId.description: An ID which identifies the publisher's account

siteId.description: An ID which identifies the site selling the impression

zoneId.description: An ID which identifies the sub-section of the site where the impression is located

inventory.description: An object defining arbitrary targeting key/value pairs related to the page

visitor.description: An object defining arbitrary targeting key/value pairs related to the visitor

video.description: An object defining additional Rubicon video parameters

Language.description: Language of the ad - should match content video

PlayerHeight.description: Height in pixels of the video player

PlayerWidth.description: Width in pixels of the video player

VideoSizeID.description: Rubicon size_id, used to describe type of video ad (preroll, postroll, etc)

Skip.description: Can this ad be skipped ( 0 = no, 1 = yes)

SkipDelay.description: number of seconds until the ad can be skipped

pulsepoint.title: Pulsepoint Adapter Params
pulsepoint.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Pulsepoint adapter

cp.description: An ID which identifies the publisher selling the impression

ct.description: An ID which identifies the ad slot being sold

cf.description: The size of the ad slot being sold. This should be a string like 300x250

conversant.title: Conversant Adapter Params
conversant.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Conversant adapter.

site_id.description: A Conversant specific ID which identifies the site.

secure.description: Override http/https context on ad markup.

bidfloor.description: Minimum bid price that will be considered.

mobile.description: Indicate if the site is mobile optimized.

mimes.description: Array of content MIME types.  For videos only.

maxduration.description: Maximum duration in seconds.  For videos only.

api.description: Array of supported API frameworks.  For videos only.

protocols.description: Array of supported video protocols.  For videos only.

indexExchange.title: Index Adapter Params
indexExchange.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Index adapter

siteID.description: An ID which identifies the site selling the impression
